projectinfo1:
Role: Data Analyst | Academic Experience
Creates end-to-end pipeline for a geolocalized reccomendation system based on Google Maps & Yelp reviews. For Convenience Store competitors, focused on fictional client, Walgreens.
projectname2: Road Accidents, City of Buenos Aires
projectinfo2:
Role: Data Analyst
Data analysis and visualization using Python and Pandas for ETL/EDA, and Tableau for the creation of interactive dashboards on road accidents in the City of Buenos Aires.
projectinfo3:
Role: Data Engineer and Scientist
Deployment of a functional API for general queries and a recommendation model for Steam videogames platform.
projectinfo4:
